citations.narrative:
The squirrel and the foxes are currently housed in outdoor enclosures that are not enclosed by a 6 foot perimeter fence.
The squirrel enclosure perimeter fence has a section that is only 5 feet tall, and the fox enclosure perimeter fence is only
4-5 feet tall. Perimeter fences must be constructed and maintained in such a way that they prevent animals and
unauthorized persons from going through or under the fence, they can also act as a secondary containment for animals in
the facility and they protect the health and well-being of the animals.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
KATHARINE FRANK, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.127(d)  Repeat
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
The squirrel and the foxes are currently housed in outdoor enclosures that are not enclosed by a 6 foot perimeter fence. 
The squirrel enclosure perimeter fence has a section that is only 5 feet tall, and the fox enclosure perimeter fence is only 
4-5 feet tall. Perimeter fences must be constructed and maintained in such a way that they prevent animals and 
unauthorized persons from going through or under the fence, they can also act as a secondary containment for animals in 
the facility and they protect the health and well-being of the animals. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KATHARINE FRANK, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
